body_html:
The standard distribution of TensorFlow requires CUDA support for GPU acceleration. You might be able to use the experimental OpenCL support, but it is currently Linux-only. Documentation for the OpenCL support is available here:

https://github.com/benoitsteiner/tensorflow-opencl/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#optional-install-opencl-experimental-linux-only
body_text:
The standard distribution of TensorFlow requires CUDA support for GPU acceleration. You might be able to use the experimental OpenCL support, but it is currently Linux-only. Documentation for the OpenCL support is available here:
https://github.com/benoitsteiner/tensorflow-opencl/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#optional-install-opencl-experimental-linux-only
body:
The standard distribution of TensorFlow requires CUDA support for GPU acceleration. You might be able to use the experimental OpenCL support, but it is currently Linux-only. Documentation for the OpenCL support is available here:

https://github.com/benoitsteiner/tensorflow-opencl/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md#optional-install-opencl-experimental-linux-only
